docs.snippet: Cook for someone special, however you feel about Cupids and flowers, and make a rib-eye with potatoes, or even a simple mug of spicy hot chocolate.

docs.snippet: After a standoff, Korryn Gaines was shot several times by a Baltimore County police officer. Her 5-year-old son, lingering nearby, was struck twice by gunfire.

docs.snippet: The brower’s latest update filters out pop-up ads and other annoyances. It also strengthens Google’s grip on the web.

docs.snippet: Vito Perillo, a 93-year-old World War II veteran, was elected to his first term as mayor of Tinton Falls. But he’s dealing with a familiar problem: a disagreeable Borough Council.

headline.print_headline: Tinton Falls Mayor Is New to Office, but an Old Hand at Life
